Posts.Content: Mar 26, 2013 09:14PM DSH1021 wrote: Greetings to everyone.... I will be starting TC on April 11. Reading (and shopping...my favorite therapy modality) is helping me feel more in control. Also started at a local support group run by an oncology nurse - very helpful. Since I had hyperemesis during pregnancy 6 years ago she advised making sure my oncologist knew. peace...
Posts.Title: April 2013 Chemo Group BeHereNow 6cats
